attributes.action: reverse the decision of Manchseter City Council and allow public big screens to show the Champions League final in the city centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the scenes in the aftermath of Wednesday 14th May's UEFA cup final, in which a minority of Rangers fans clashed with police in Manchester city centre, the council has decided not to screen the Champions League final on Wednesday 21st May, despite Manchester United's involvement. This seems a bizzare punishment for the people of Manchester, who were innocent bystanders in the scenes, and one that the prime minister should overturn.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
